name: Broken Core
description:
Broken core  is a PC Windows indie videogame developed by Oscar Celestini.
It's a new game with retrogame taste.
Do you loved Turrican or Megaman? Add tits and that's it!
Playing the Story mode you'll see lots of illustrations between stages.

More than 30 playable levels and the Survival mode available in this complete version.

Playable with keyboard, J2k works fine for a pad custom configuration. 

This game was fully funded on Indiegogo (131%) http://igg.me/p/1027371/x/1620013 Try the free playable demo here: http://brokencorethegame.blogspot.it/
